title: Soft Ice Cream

adjectives: Having a low or inadequate temperature or feeling a sensation of coldness or having been made cold by e.g. ice or refrigeration
Having or denoting the characteristic taste of sugar
Having the taste characteristic of sugar or honey.
verbs: To consume something solid or semi-solid (usually food) by putting it into the mouth and eventually swallowing it.
To consume (something solid or semi-solid, usually food) by putting it into the mouth and swallowing it.
nouns: Ice cream
Frozen dessert
Ice cream is a frozen food usually made from dairy products, such as milk and cream and often combined with fruits or other ingredients and flavors.
Frozen dessert containing cream and sugar and flavoring
A cold dessert (made of water, cream and milk, combined with flavourings, emulsifiers and sugar) that's popular when it's hot.
A dessert made from frozen sweetened cream or a similar substance, usually flavoured.
One of the temperate seasons
Summer is the warmest of the four temperate seasons, falling between spring and autumn.
The period or season of summer.
One of the four seasons, between Spring and Autumn
The warmest season of the year; in the northern hemisphere it extends from the summer solstice to the autumnal equinox
The time during the summer months.
A sweet confection served as the last course of a meal
A dish served as the last course of a meal
A usage seen in the United Kingdom and some other Commonwealth countries.
Dessert is a typically sweet course that concludes an evening meal.
A sweet confection served as the last course of a meal.
Sweet confection served as the last course of a meal.
Sweet course that concludes a meal
A cold dessert similar to ice cream, made with eggs in addition to cream and sugar.
A kind of semiliquid ice cream that is squirted out into cones or cups.
Dessert resembling ice cream but with a boiled custard base
A frozen dessert or snack, similar to ice cream but softer, as a result of air being introduced during freezing.
Soft serve is a type of ice cream that is softer than regular ice cream, as a result of air being introduced during freezing.
Frozen custard is a cold dessert similar to ice cream, but made with eggs in addition to cream and sugar.
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description: A swirl of soft-serve ice cream atop a wafer-style cone, white or cream-colored, as vanilla, on most platforms. Facebook’s design suggests strawberry. May be used more generally for ice cream, frozen yogurt, and frozen treats.
apple_vendor_description: This soft-serve ice cream emoji on Apple devices is a delightful visual treat, showcasing a swirl of creamy goodness with a glossy sheen and realistic highlights that make it look refreshingly cold.  Rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, it perfectly captures the inviting texture and appealing form of a classic cone.  It's the perfect emoji to convey indulgence, sweetness, or a desire for a cool, delightful snack, adding a touch of summery pleasure to your texts.
